title: GET_VARIATION_CHOSEN_FOR_SCRIPTED_LINE
content:
0xAA19F5572C38B5640xB58B8FF3// GetVariationChosenForScriptedLine
int GET_VARIATION_CHOSEN_FOR_SCRIPTED_LINE(char* textLabel);Parameters:textLabel: all the text labels for filenames in AmericanDialogueFiles.txt appear to end with the letter 'A', it is the script's responsibility to add this 'A' before calling GET_VARIATION_CHOSEN_FOR_SCRIPTED_LINE.Returns: Returns the variation chosen for a given script speech line, or 0 if it hasn't been chosen yet.Returns -1 if there is no conversation active or if the active conversation doesn't contain this line or if the text label can't be found in the currently loaded text blocks
